sentences.english: "Let's go for it again, " Bryant said, moments before hoisting the finals MVP trophy.

sentences.english: Surprisingly, after chewing it for a bit, he found it sweetish and rather pleasant.

sentences.english: I will never forget the smile when she accepted the flowers.

definition: to hand over/to pass on sth/to gradually increase or decrease/progressively
to fish out/to take out (from a pocket, bag etc)
in hand/(a situation is) in sb's hands
to heave/to lift/to raise up/to uphold
to reach out with one's hand/to hold out a hand/(fig.) to beg/to get involved/to meddle
to get up/to leave/to set forth
to take out/to put out/to provide/to put forward (a proposal)/to come up with (evidence)
to pick up (from the ground with one's hands)
